#summary &icirc character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesI

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &icirc

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Icirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ce/index.htm U+000CE].
  * `&Icirc` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ce/index.htm U+000CE].
  * `&icirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ee/index.htm U+000EE].
  * `&icirc` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ee/index.htm U+000EE].
